column5: You think you live in a tough neighborhood? Welcome to our world. http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/thunder-bay/goat-attacked-by-lynx-fur-flies-inside-northern-ontario-home-1.3009166
Good for Stella - I am a little surprised that she did that, however.
You guys never seem to lack for entertainment do you skywagon? Close to your place?I'd be tempted to mount that lynx if it was OK with the MNR.Pooch
That was about 5-6 miles away from us as the crow flies (just north of Dinorwic). That fellow used to own the Green Acres LCBO/store in Wabigoon.
And people say nothing exciting never happens up there!!!!!!I've never had a Lynx in my house!!!, come to think about it I don't have a goat either.
